[Home](./index.md) &gt; [iconv-corefoundation](./iconv-corefoundation.md) &gt; [SelectAndEncodeOptions](./iconv-corefoundation.selectandencodeoptions.md) &gt; [isEncodingOk](./iconv-corefoundation.selectandencodeoptions.isencodingok.md)

## SelectAndEncodeOptions.isEncodingOk() method

Decides whether to encode with the given [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEncodingOk?(encoding: StringEncoding): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  encoding | <code>StringEncoding</code> | The selected [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

`true` if the text should be encoded; `false` to abort encoding. If this method returns `false`<!-- -->, then the calling function (`encodeSmallest` or `transcodeSmallest`<!-- -->) will return `null` instead of the encoded text.

## Remarks

This method is called by `encodeSmallest` and `transcodeSmallest` to let the application decide whether to proceed with Core Foundation's chosen smallest encoding, before actually performing the work of encoding the text.
